00019 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest.h"
00020 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdater.h"
00021 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter.h"
00022 #include "CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader.h"

00024 using namespace std;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_data;
00027 
00028 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest );
00029 
00030 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.quantification_detection_updater_test"
00031 
00032 void CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 void CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceFile()
00037 {
00038         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data(TEST_FILE);
00039         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00040         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter(data);
00041         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00042 
00043         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00044         e.name = "1";
00045         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00046     e.pvalue = 0.1f;
00047         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00048         e.name = "2";
00049         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00050     e.pvalue = 0.2f;
00051         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00052         e.name = "3";
00053         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00054     e.pvalue = 0.3f;
00055         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00056         e.name = "4";
00057         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00058     e.pvalue = 0.4f;
00059         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00060 
00061         delete writer;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest::tearDown()
00065 {
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdaterTest::testQuantificationDetection()
00069 {
00070         CreateReferenceFile();
00071 
00072         CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileUpdater upd;
00073         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00074         upd.UpdateQuantification(0, 123.0f);
00075         upd.UpdateQuantification(2, 222.0f);
00076     upd.UpdateDetection(1, 0.22f);
00077 
00078         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data;
00079         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 4);
00083 
00084         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00085         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(0, e);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "1");
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 123.0f, 0.000001f);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.pvalue, 0.1f, 0.000001f);
00089         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(1, e);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "2");
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 20.0f, 0.000001f);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.pvalue, 0.22f, 0.000001f);
00093         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(2, e);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "3");
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 222.0f, 0.000001f);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.pvalue, 0.3f, 0.000001f);
00097         data.GetQuantificationDetectionEntry(3, e);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "4");
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 40.0f, 0.000001f);
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.pvalue, 0.4f, 0.000001f);
00101 }
